Actions.ActionName: Update Menu Bar Mode when recording starts
We prepare ‚Äúsw_recentFolder‚Äù with the latest recording folder (which triggered this macro)
Pause for 1 Second - Just to Verify Recording - Whether we'll hide or not SW
HIDE - This hides rec window (YABAI) on a per-interaction basis, depending on action mode
Wait 4 Sec. For Alfred to Activate CopySelect
Show copySelect indicator in Menu Bar (for Alfred Workflow users)
